tune.name: Chris Gray â€“ The Musician
tune.author: Mikael Georgii
tune.content:
\relative f' <<
  {
    \clef treble
    \key d \major
    \time 4/4

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 a'8 g |
      fis8 d cis d a d fis a |
      g a, cis g' fis d cis d |
      e8 a, gis a cis a d a |
      e'8 g fis d e a, cis e |
      \break

      fis8 d cis d a d fis a |
      g a, cis g' fis d cis d |
      e8 a, fis' a, g' e cis d |
      e8 fis d cis d4
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      e8 d |
      cis8 b cis d e cis a b |
      cis8 a d a e' cis a cis |
      d8 cis d e fis d a d |
      fis8 a, g' a, a' fis e d |
      \break

      cis8 b cis d e cis a b |
      cis8 a d a e' cis a a' |
      fis8 a, g' a, a' fis e d |
      e8 fis d cis d4
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      s4 |
      d2 d/fis | a:7 d | a a:7/cis | e:m7 a:7 |
      d2 d/fis | a:7 d/fis | a:7 a:7/e | a d4

      \parenthesize e4:7 |
      a2:7/cis a | a a/cis | d d/fis | d4 a/e d2/fis |
      a2:7/e a | a4 b:m a2/cis | d d/fis | a d4
    }
  }
>>
